document.full_text: thailand's 83-year-old king bhumibol adulyadej is recovering well following an operation to remove cerebrospinal fluid, the royal household bureau said on tuesday.
document.title: thai king recovering following operation - royal household
lines_and_colors: thailand's 83-year-old king bhumibol adulyadej is recovering well following an operation to remove cerebrospinal fluid, the royal household bureau said on tuesday.
